name: Crystal Caves (itch) (Frostwind3000, Justice Shultz)
description:
This dungeon crawler features a creature on a quest for gems! To exit this mysterious dungeon you'll need to fight enemies collect artifacts and dash your way through the different rooms the dungeon has to offer.

Programmers
  • Justice Shultz
  • Joshua Yang
Designers
  • Jorden Dobson
  • Josh Livingston
Artists
  • Kate Kruse
  • Audrey Meyer
  • Jaycee Isenhart
  • Hayden Nichols
